##Getting and cleaning Data - Course project
        This project consists of a script file named my_script.R. It is responsible for 
        getting, cleaning and writing to a tidy.txt file.
        1. Gets the data set.
        2. Merges the traning and test data set.
        3. Removes unwanted part  of the data and gives meningfull names to rows and columns.
        4. Writes the cleaned data to a text file names tidy.txt
